# Space Seminar. Biotechnology Space Support Center-- AGH UST 

URL: https://agh.edu.pl/en/students/events/detail/s/space-seminar-biotechnology-space-support-center
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:22:22

Space Seminar. Biotechnology Space Support Center

 26.03.2025 

 Download iCal file 

Add to Google Calendar

Add to Outlook Calendar

Add to Office 365 Calendar

Add to Yahoo Calendar

 The AGH University Space Technology Centre invites you to join the next Space Seminar, held by Dr Bernd Rattenbacher, on 26 March, at 3pm. 

 Description 

The seminar will be conducted by 
Dr Bernd Rattenbacher
, a manager at BIOTESC, in the form of an 
online meeting on MS Teams
 (no need to register).

BIOTESC 
(Biotechnology Space Support Center) is a space research centre working on behalf of the European Space Agency and attached to the Lucerne University of Applied Sciences and Arts (HSLU). BIOTESC is specialized in space research and biotechnologies: on behalf of the European Space Agency, the centre offers assistance for the preparation, execution and post-flight analysis of many space experiments generally related to biotechnologies or information technologies.

It advises scientists who intend to perform biological experiments under zero gravity conditions on board the International Space Station (ISS) in the Columbus space laboratory and supports the astronauts conducting the experiment.
